faqs.q: What court deals with traffic tickets in Calgary?
faqs.a: Calgary Traffic Court handles most city infractions. Local procedures vary—check the ticket or contact the court office.

faqs.q: Can I request disclosure online in Calgary?
faqs.a: Yes, in many cases you can request disclosure online or via the court—check the local court site or ask Fabsy to help.

faqs.q: Are Calgary speed camera tickets disputable?
faqs.a: Sometimes—disputability depends on evidence and issuer. Request disclosure and review the photos before deciding.
